glosses: gradually, progressively, by degrees as time goes by

examples.text: Gittikçe daha çok anne emzirmeyi tercih ediyor.
examples.translation: More and more mothers are choosing to breastfeed.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish كتدكجه or كیتدكجه (gitdikce, gittikçe), from كتمك (gitmek), equivalent to git- (“to go”) + -tik + -çe. Cognates with Azerbaijani getdikcə, Turkmen gitdikçe.
